info.name: TrilobeMain API - OTP Based
info.description: OTP-based authentication API collection for TrilobeMain Django project (No passwords required)

query.description: Required. Type: hotel, homestay, package, houseboat, activity, cab
Duration in days or range (Packages, Activities)
Filter by cruise type or AC type

request.description: Unified search API. Required param 'type' (hotel, homestay, package, houseboat, activity, cab). Optional filters: destination, price_min, price_max, capacity, etc.
Get top 8 popular hotels and resorts for the home page cards.
Get top 8 popular homestays and villas for the home page cards.
Get top 8 popular holiday packages for the home page cards.
Get top 8 popular houseboats for the home page cards.
Get top 8 popular activities for the home page cards.

item.name: Listings

query.description: Filter by star rating (1-5). Add multiple keys for multi-select.
Filter by city. Add multiple keys for multi-select.
hotel, resort. Add multiple keys for multi-select.
Filter by amenity ID. Add multiple keys for multi-select.

request.description: Get paginated list of hotels and resorts with filters and sorting.

query.description: Filter by city. Add multiple keys for multi-select.
Filter by star rating (1-5). Add multiple keys for multi-select.
homestay, villa, apartment. Add multiple keys for multi-select.
Number of bedrooms required. Add multiple keys for multi-select.

request.description: Get paginated list of homestays and villas.

query.description: Filter by package theme. Add multiple keys for multi-select.
Filter by exact duration in days (Legacy)

request.description: Get paginated list of holiday packages.
Get paginated list of houseboats.

query.description: Filter by activity type. Add multiple keys for multi-select.

request.description: Get paginated list of activities.
Get paginated list of cabs.
Get a list of famous places in a specific city.

item.description: Endpoints for search result listing pages across all verticals.

formdata.description: Required. User's phone number. Must be unique.

request.description: Register a new user by sending OTP to phone number. No password required.
Login by sending OTP to phone number. No password required.
Verify OTP and get JWT tokens. Use this after register or login.

item.name: Hotels

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific hotel including images, amenities, pricing summary, and similar hotels. Required for the Hotel Detail Page UI.
Check room availability and base pricing for a hotel based on specific dates and guest count.

item.description: Read-only hotel detail and availability endpoints

item.name: Homestays

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific homestay or villa including images, amenities, pricing summary, and similar properties.
Check room availability and calculate total stay costs for a homestay or villa based on dates and guests.

item.description: Read-only homestay/villa detail and availability endpoints

item.name: Holiday Packages

request.description: Get full details of a single holiday package by its ID including itinerary, accommodation, and inclusions. Optimized for the Detail Page UI.
Get pricing breakdown for a holiday package including base price, discounts, and per-person rates.

item.description: Endpoints for holiday packages management and detail viewing.

item.name: Houseboats

request.description: Get comprehensive details for a houseboat, including specifications, timings, meal plans, and similar houseboats.

item.description: Endpoints for houseboat detail and management.

item.name: Cabs

query.description: Filter by Fuel Type (Multi-select: petrol, diesel, cng)

request.description: List all cabs with advanced filters (Category, Fuel Type, Model, Capacity, Transfer Type) and faceted counts.
Get comprehensive details for a cab, including summary, pricing breakdown, and policies.

item.description: Endpoints for cab detail and booking context.

item.name: Activities

request.description: Get comprehensive details for an activity, experience, or trek including itinerary, pricing, and policies.

item.description: Endpoints for activities, treks, and experiences.

request.description: Get all bookings for the authenticated user.
Get details of a specific booking. Response includes type-specific fields (e.g., package_title, activity_title) and generic item_image.

formdata.description: Optional. Type of booking. Choices: stay, package, activity, cab, houseboat. Default: stay.
Conditional. Required for stay booking items.
Conditional. Required for package booking items.
Conditional. Required for activity booking items.
Conditional. Required for cab booking items.
Conditional. Required for houseboat booking items.

request.description:
Review a booking before confirmation. This creates a draft booking and returns pricing details, taxes, and applied coupons.

Fields:
- booking_type: stay | package | activity | cab | houseboat (required)
- property_id: Property ID (required for stay)
- check_in: Check-in date (required)
- check_out: Check-out date (required)
- coupon_code: Optional coupon code
- items: Array of booking items (same structure as Create Booking)

Response:
- booking_id: ID of the draft booking (use this for confirmation)

query.description: ID of the draft booking to retrieve review details

request.description: Retrieve details of a draft booking using its ID. This is useful for re-fetching the review page.

formdata.description: Conditional. Required if is_gst_required is true.
Conditional. Required if is_gst_required is true.
Conditional. Required if is_gst_required is true.
Optional. ID of a Traveller to link to this booking.

request.description:
Confirm a draft booking by providing traveller details.

Path Params:
- booking_id: ID of the draft booking returned from Review Booking API

Fields:
- title: Mr | Ms | Mrs (required)
- full_name: Name of primary guest (required)
- email: Email address (required)
- phone: Phone number (required)
- country_code: Country code (e.g., +91)
- special_requests: Optional text
- is_gst_required: Boolean (true/false)
- gst_number: Required if is_gst_required=true
- company_name: Required if is_gst_required=true
- company_address: Required if is_gst_required=true
List all valid coupons.

item.name: Support

query.description: Filter FAQs by city or area name

request.description: Fetch a list of location-based FAQs and travel guides (e.g., Famous places to visit in a city).

item.description: Endpoints for support, FAQs, and travel guides.

request.description: List all food destinations, filterable by location and sorted by rating (descending).
Get details of a specific food destination by slug.
